question:
Arrange the following ports of the western coast of India from South to North
1. New Mangalore Port
2. Jawahar Lal Nehru Port
3. Mumbai Port
4. Cochin Port
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The correct order from South to North- Cochin port (Kerala), New Mangalore Port (Karnataka), Jawahar Lal Nehru Port (Maharashtra), Mumbai Port (Maharashtra).
